job_description: SpaceList is a marketplace for office, retail and industrial space. We host 1/2 billion square feet of available space and generate over 100 inquiries each day.At SpaceList, you will learn how to put yourself in our users’ shoes, understand their issues, and design a solution that will knock their socks off. You will be assigned two software engineers to be your mentors, and help them draw insight from feedback to get ideas across clearly and concisely. Rolling up your sleeves to do what needs to get done is a day to day activity... whether it is a quick bug fix or a writing an algorithm to improve our user’s searches. At SpaceList, all engineers become comfortable at the top of the stack all the way to the bottom. Whether it’s tweaking CSS layout issues or getting a database model into third normal form. Above all else, you are an excellent communicator and collaborator.Previous co-op employees have:• Integrated an AB testing platform into our system,• Created a tooltip tour of our site, and• Improved the listing shortlist feature to be more prominent on out site.Join the growing list of SpaceList Co-op alumnus today!
job_requirements: • Working knowledge of AngularJS, Ruby on Rails, PostgreSQL, and ElasticSearch are a huge plus.• Knowledge of the Unix command line is essential.• Ability to work independently or in a small team.• 8, 12 or 16 month terms available.• SpaceList is a bring your own computer workplace.Open To All Majors:No
